page.title: 16PASTIMES
page.content: These are some of the pastimes that happen during the year. {Gun Club}- organises clay pigeon shoots. {Highland Gathering}- a traditional Highland Games, held each July. {Whist Drives}- held during winter for local and national charities. {Gala}- organises contests,dances,games and sheepdog trials. A Gala Queen is also picked. {Youth Club}- most Saturdays games such as badminton and table tennis are held {Dances}- held mostly on Fridays throughout the year. {Darts and Pool}- tournaments held several times a year. {Ceildh}- traditional Ceildhs are only held very occasionally in Durness . {Football}- Durness have a football team and they play mostly at the weekends.
